Supplier.description: Supplier/company name issuing the sourcing declaration (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material/raw material name covered by the sourcing declaration.

MaterialCode.description: Supplier or internal material identifier, if present.

IssueDate.description: Date on which the sourcing form/declaration was issued or signed.

PetroleumComponents.description: Petroleum component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

StartingMaterial.description: Starting material as printed in the table

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

PetroleumAnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates any of the Petroleum Components are animal-derived or animal-related. False if not.

PlantComponents.description: Plant component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

StartingMaterial.description: Starting material as printed in the table

GenusAndSpecies.description: Genus and species for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

PartsUsed.description: Parts used for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

ContainsGMO.description: Indicates if the component is derived from genetically modified organisms.

PlantDerivedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates any of the Plant Components are animal-derived or animal-related. False if not.

MineralComponents.description: Mineral component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

StartingMaterial.description: Starting material as printed in the table

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

MineralAnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates any of the Mineral Components are animal-derived or animal-related. False if not.

AnimalComponents.description: Animal component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

StartingMaterial.description: Starting material as printed in the table

GenusAndSpecies.description: Genus and species for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

PartsUsed.description: Parts used for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

ContainsGMO.description: Indicates if the component is derived from genetically modified organisms.

AnimalComponentsAnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates any of the Animal Components are animal-derived or animal-related. False if not.

AnimalRelatedComponents.description: Animal related component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

StartingMaterial.description: Starting material as printed in the table

GenusAndSpecies.description: Genus and species for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

PartsUsed.description: Parts used for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

ContainsGMO.description: Indicates if the component is derived from genetically modified organisms.

AnimalRelatedAnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates any of the Animal Related Components are animal-derived or animal-related. False if not.

MicroOrganismComponents.description: Microorganism component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

TypeOfMicroorganism.description: Type of microorganism as printed in the table, like Yeast, Bacteria, etc.

GenusAndSpecies.description: Genus and species for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

ContainsGMO.description: Indicates if the component is derived from genetically modified organisms.

SubstrateGrowthComponents.description: Substrate/Growth media component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

StartingMaterial.description: Starting material as printed in the table, like Yeast, Bacteria, etc.

StartingMaterialCategory.description: Category of starting material as printed in the table

GenusAndSpecies.description: Genus and species for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

CountriesOfOrigin.description: Countries of Origin as printed in the table.

ProcessingAids.description: Processing aids as printed in the table.

ContainsGMO.description: Indicates if the component is derived from genetically modified organisms.

MicroorganismAnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if under the Microorganism section the form indicates the processing aids contain animal derived or related materials. False if not.
